version_description:
I've been hard at work improving my TV apps and Signal GH is the first out of the gate with a cleaner look and a more accurate database of US digital TV antennas.

• Newly generated antenna database.
• Cleaner non-major antenna pins
• New bar graph graphic design.
• Better use of space in phone landscape mode.
• Show target devices name instead of IP address.
• New graphics.

• The manual IP address entry view had several serious issues during onboarding.
• The app could crash if the onboarding scan button was pressed when there were no selected tuners.
• Trying to change the channel for a locked tuner would crash on the iPad.
* Scanning for tuners was unacceptably slow, scanning for channels was abominably slow. My apologies for the bug.

• Cleaned up several glitches in the UI.
• Manual selecting of channels wasn't working in settings.
• Status bar wasn't visible after on boarding.
• Rescan nng channels was not picking up new channels

•Added refresh tuners button to the main interface
• Updated the towers database
• Changed the layout of the tower detail panel

• Updated towers map to a more modern UI.
• Fixed a variety of defects.
• Updated the towers database.

• Updated towers database
• Tweaked appearance on devices without home buttons.

• Stability improvements
• Maps updated to try to keep up with ongoing FCC "repack" of allocated channels.
• Some map stations, especially translators will show the incorrect real channel as the repack settles down.

• Added reminders of ongoing repack of broadcast channels in the USA.
• Tapping on the tower detail view was not opening it as expected.
• Updated map database.
• Cleaned up table layouts.
• Sped up rate of checking the device status.

• Fixing crash when onboarding under iOS 13 while manually choosing channels
• Fixing crash when onboarding with no tuners available for scanning
• Fixing crash when tuners become available while showing the bar charts on iOS 13.
